title: Vite WP Component
text: A Vite plugin and CLI tool for building WordPress components.

title: Bundling with Vite
text: It bundles your project with Vite, ensuring modern and efficient JavaScript packaging.

title: PHP Bridge Generation
text: Generates the necessary PHP bridge file so your component can be used seamlessly in WordPress.

title: Shortcode Exposure
text: Leverages the WordPress Plugin API to expose your component as a shortcode for easy embedding.

title: FTP Deployment
text: Provides FTP deployment utilities for pushing updates directly to your WordPress site.
